questions.title: Tell us about yourself!
questions.info: Tell us what you like, what you do not like, what are your hobbies, passions and desires. Let us know you a bit better.

questions.title: Education
questions.info: Tell us about your education. Do not be afraid to mentione extra-curricular activities, courses or conferences. We value every piece of information you give us!

questions.title: Work Experience
questions.info: Tell us about your work experience. Where have you worked until now, what are your experiences from that period, what have you learned, what haven't you learned...

questions.title: What do you expect from us?
questions.info: Talk to us about your expectations. Make sure to mention your hourly rate and all other financial and non-financial packages your expect.

questions.title: Why should we hire you?
questions.info: Tell us what makes you unique. Try to present yourself and convince us to hire you.
